name: Winning Post World 2010
overview: "Winning Post World 2010" is a work that adds the latest horse racing data and new elements to play more fun to the simulation game "Winning Post World". Players can choose between "horse owners" who produce and own thoroughbreds, "trainers" who train their horses, and "jockeys" who ride in races and aim to win, toward the clear goal set for each scenario. , Nurture characters. A new type of horse racing simulation game where you can experience three professions. In response to the latest horse racing situation in 2010, the newly established "Maidan Racecourse" and the step race "Miyako Stakes" to the "Japan Cup Dirt" will be newly added. In addition, in the limited time of 20 years, it is also equipped with a "new world mode" that fights against rival horses that are connected with blood, and you can enjoy a new play of dramatic development.
